document.full_text: resurgent former world number four juan martin del potro has been forced to withdraw from the madrid open because of a hip problem and will also miss next week's rome masters.
document.title: del potro withdraws from madrid with hip injury
lines_and_colors: resurgent former world number four juan martin del potro has been forced to withdraw from the madrid open because of a hip problem and will also miss next week's rome masters.
